snippet.title: Night Dessert Trailer - Visual novel game
snippet.description:
✨ FREE DEMO available on STEAM ✨

Welcome to Night Dessert!

A sultry talking simulator in a cozy pixel-art pastry shop.
Chat with fascinating characters, uncover their secrets, and enjoy flirty conversations—all while a mysterious city faces new prohibition laws.

Support us by wishlisting us on STEAM
---
By wishlisting the game on Steam and backing us on Patreon, you're playing a key role in bringing the next episodes to life.
---
